name: doc-sync-on-save
description: Update documentation when source files are saved

action.prompt:
A source file was saved. Check if documentation needs updating:

1. Identify any new or modified public APIs, functions, or classes
2. If changes are significant, update:
   - .kiro/specs/api.md for API changes
   - README.md for new features
3. Keep updates minimal and focused on actual changes.
